data.name: Dirty Bomb - Squad Pack
data.detailed_description:
Jump start your Mercenary career with 5 of London's finest Mercs, and ensure that your squad covers all bases.



The Squad Pack includes:

Nader: Demolishes enemies with her Grenade Launcher and an explosive final attack.

Sawbonez: Heals teammates while holding his own in a firefight.

Stoker: Incinerates foes with Molotov grenades and locks down critical chokepoints.

Turtle: Defends his teammates with an energy shield while also repairing objectives.

Vassili: Spots enemies for teammates and takes them out at a distance.

data.short_description: Jump start your Mercenary career with 5 of London's finest Mercs, and ensure that your squad covers all bases.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB - GeForce 7800GTX
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB - GeForce 710 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
